resources.string: Omegle is a great way of meeting new friends. When you use Omegle, we pick another user at random and let you have a one-on-one chat with each other. Chats are completely anonymous, and you can disconnect whenever you like, although there is also nothing to stop you from revealing personal details if you choose to.
Type interests here (use comma for more)
You\'re now chatting with a random stranger. Say hi!
Spy mode lets you ask a question and watch two strangers discuss it. (The strangers volunteer to be watched.) Ask anything you like, but try to keep questions open-ended and thought-provoking.
